trans-unit.source: Creates an <codeEntityReference autoUpgrade="true">T:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.ICloudPool</codeEntityReference> object that contains the task virtual machines that are used to process tasks.
trans-unit.target: Creates an <codeEntityReference autoUpgrade="true">T:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.ICloudPool</codeEntityReference> object that contains the task virtual machines that are used to process tasks.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the pool.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the pool.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the operating system family of the task virtual machines in the pool.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the operating system family of the task virtual machines in the pool.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size of the virtual machines in the pool.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the size of the virtual machines in the pool.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the initial number of task virtual machines that should be dedicated to the pool.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the initial number of task virtual machines that should be dedicated to the pool.

trans-unit.source: If you set up automatic scaling when the pool is created using the <codeEntityReference>P:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.ICloudPool.AutoScaleEnabled</codeEntityReference> and <codeEntityReference>P:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.ICloudPool.AutoScaleFormula</codeEntityReference> properties, the targetDedicated parameter for the pool is not used.
trans-unit.target: If you set up automatic scaling when the pool is created using the <codeEntityReference>P:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.ICloudPool.AutoScaleEnabled</codeEntityReference> and <codeEntityReference>P:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.ICloudPool.AutoScaleFormula</codeEntityReference> properties, the targetDedicated parameter for the pool is not used.

trans-unit.source: If you enable automatic scaling on the pool after it is created using the <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.IPoolManager.EnableAutoScale(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.Azure.Batch.BatchClientBehavior})</codeEntityReference> method, the value that you specify for targetDedicated is ignored.
trans-unit.target: If you enable automatic scaling on the pool after it is created using the <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.IPoolManager.EnableAutoScale(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.Azure.Batch.BatchClientBehavior})</codeEntityReference> method, the value that you specify for targetDedicated is ignored.

trans-unit.source: For more information about automatic scaling, see <externalLink><linkText>Automatically scale task virtual machines in an Azure Batch pool</linkText><linkUri>https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/batch-automatic-scaling/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about automatic scaling, see <externalLink><linkText>Automatically scale task virtual machines in an Azure Batch pool</linkText><linkUri>https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/batch-automatic-scaling/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a pool and enable automatic scaling with a formula.
trans-unit.target: The following example shows how to create a pool and enable automatic scaling with a formula.
